Provides a Serverless App Engine (SAE) Application resource.

For information about Serverless App Engine (SAE) Application and how to use it, see [What is Application](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/97792.html).

> **NOTE:** Available in v1.133.0+.

{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AliCloud = Pulumi.AliCloud;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var config = new Config();
        var name = config.Get("name") ?? "tf-testacc";
        var defaultZones = Output.Create(AliCloud.GetZones.InvokeAsync(new AliCloud.GetZonesArgs
        {
            AvailableResourceCreation = "VSwitch",
        }));
        var vpc = new AliCloud.Vpc.Network("vpc", new AliCloud.Vpc.NetworkArgs
        {
            VpcName = "tf_testacc",
            CidrBlock = "172.16.0.0/12",
        });
        var vsw = new AliCloud.Vpc.Switch("vsw", new AliCloud.Vpc.SwitchArgs
        {
            VpcId = vpc.Id,
            CidrBlock = "172.16.0.0/24",
            ZoneId = defaultZones.Apply(defaultZones => defaultZones.Zones[0].Id),
            VswitchName = name,
        });
        var defaultNamespace = new AliCloud.Sae.Namespace("defaultNamespace", new AliCloud.Sae.NamespaceArgs
        {
            NamespaceDescription = name,
            NamespaceId = "cn-hangzhou:tfacctest",
            NamespaceName = name,
        });
        var defaultApplication = new AliCloud.Sae.Application("defaultApplication", new AliCloud.Sae.ApplicationArgs
        {
            AppDescription = "tf-testaccDescription",
            AppName = "tf-testaccAppName",
            NamespaceId = defaultNamespace.Id,
            ImageUrl = "registry-vpc.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/lxepoo/apache-php5",
            PackageType = "Image",
            VswitchId = vsw.Id,
            Timezone = "Asia/Beijing",
            Replicas = 5,
            Cpu = 500,
            Memory = 2048,
        });
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v3/go/alicloud"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v3/go/alicloud/sae"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v3/go/alicloud/vpc"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi/config"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		cfg := config.New(ctx, "")
		name := "tf-testacc"
		if param := cfg.Get("name"); param != "" {
			name = param
		}
		opt0 := "VSwitch"
		defaultZones, err := alicloud.GetZones(ctx, &alicloud.GetZonesArgs{
			AvailableResourceCreation: &opt0,
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		vpc, err := vpc.NewNetwork(ctx, "vpc", &vpc.NetworkArgs{
			VpcName:   pulumi.String("tf_testacc"),
			CidrBlock: pulumi.String("172.16.0.0/12"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		vsw, err := vpc.NewSwitch(ctx, "vsw", &vpc.SwitchArgs{
			VpcId:       vpc.ID(),
			CidrBlock:   pulumi.String("172.16.0.0/24"),
			ZoneId:      pulumi.String(defaultZones.Zones[0].Id),
			VswitchName: pulumi.String(name),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		defaultNamespace, err := sae.NewNamespace(ctx, "defaultNamespace", &sae.NamespaceArgs{
			NamespaceDescription: pulumi.String(name),
			NamespaceId:          pulumi.String("cn-hangzhou:tfacctest"),
			NamespaceName:        pulumi.String(name),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = sae.NewApplication(ctx, "defaultApplication", &sae.ApplicationArgs{
			AppDescription: pulumi.String("tf-testaccDescription"),
			AppName:        pulumi.String("tf-testaccAppName"),
			NamespaceId:    defaultNamespace.ID(),
			ImageUrl:       pulumi.String("registry-vpc.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/lxepoo/apache-php5"),
			PackageType:    pulumi.String("Image"),
			VswitchId:      vsw.ID(),
			Timezone:       pulumi.String("Asia/Beijing"),
			Replicas:       pulumi.Int(5),
			Cpu:            pulumi.Int(500),
			Memory:         pulumi.Int(2048),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_alicloud as alicloud

config = pulumi.Config()
name = config.get("name")
if name is None:
    name = "tf-testacc"
default_zones = alicloud.get_zones(available_resource_creation="VSwitch")
vpc = alicloud.vpc.Network("vpc",
    vpc_name="tf_testacc",
    cidr_block="172.16.0.0/12")
vsw = alicloud.vpc.Switch("vsw",
    vpc_id=vpc.id,
    cidr_block="172.16.0.0/24",
    zone_id=default_zones.zones[0].id,
    vswitch_name=name)
default_namespace = alicloud.sae.Namespace("defaultNamespace",
    namespace_description=name,
    namespace_id="cn-hangzhou:tfacctest",
    namespace_name=name)
default_application = alicloud.sae.Application("defaultApplication",
    app_description="tf-testaccDescription",
    app_name="tf-testaccAppName",
    namespace_id=default_namespace.id,
    image_url="registry-vpc.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/lxepoo/apache-php5",
    package_type="Image",
    vswitch_id=vsw.id,
    timezone="Asia/Beijing",
    replicas=5,
    cpu=500,
    memory=2048)
```

{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as alicloud from "@pulumi/alicloud";

const config = new pulumi.Config();
const name = config.get("name") || "tf-testacc";
const defaultZones = alicloud.getZones({
    availableResourceCreation: "VSwitch",
});
const vpc = new alicloud.vpc.Network("vpc", {
    vpcName: "tf_testacc",
    cidrBlock: "172.16.0.0/12",
});
const vsw = new alicloud.vpc.Switch("vsw", {
    vpcId: vpc.id,
    cidrBlock: "172.16.0.0/24",
    zoneId: defaultZones.then(defaultZones => defaultZones.zones[0].id),
    vswitchName: name,
});
const defaultNamespace = new alicloud.sae.Namespace("defaultNamespace", {
    namespaceDescription: name,
    namespaceId: "cn-hangzhou:tfacctest",
    namespaceName: name,
});
const defaultApplication = new alicloud.sae.Application("defaultApplication", {
    appDescription: "tf-testaccDescription",
    appName: "tf-testaccAppName",
    namespaceId: defaultNamespace.id,
    imageUrl: "registry-vpc.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/lxepoo/apache-php5",
    packageType: "Image",
    vswitchId: vsw.id,
    timezone: "Asia/Beijing",
    replicas: "5",
    cpu: "500",
    memory: "2048",
});
```

## Application Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The Application resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="appname_csharp">
<a href="#appname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">App<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application Name. Combinations of numbers, letters, and dashes (-) are allowed. It must start with a letter and the maximum length is 36 characters.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="packagetype_csharp">
<a href="#packagetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Package<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application package type. Support FatJar, War and Image. Valid values: `FatJar`, `Image`, `War`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="replicas_csharp">
<a href="#replicas_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replicas</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application startup status checks, containers that fail multiple health checks will be shut down and restarted. Containers that do not pass the health check will not receive SLB traffic. For example: {`exec`:{`command`:[`sh`,"-c","cat /home/admin/start.sh"]},`initialDelaySeconds`:30,`periodSeconds`:30,"timeoutSeconds ":2}. Valid values: `command`, `initialDelaySeconds`, `periodSeconds`, `timeoutSeconds`.

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Graceful offline timeout, the default is 30, the unit is seconds. The value range is 1~60. Valid values: [1,60].

        <span id="timezone_csharp">
<a href="#timezone_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Timezone</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tomcatconfig_csharp">
<a href="#tomcatconfig_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tomcat<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="updatestrategy_csharp">
<a href="#updatestrategy_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Update<wbr>Strategy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The update strategy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="versionid_csharp">
<a href="#versionid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Version<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application version id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The vswitch id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application startup status checks, containers that fail multiple health checks will be shut down and restarted. Containers that do not pass the health check will not receive SLB traffic. For example: {`exec`:{`command`:[`sh`,"-c","cat /home/admin/start.sh"]},`initialDelaySeconds`:30,`periodSeconds`:30,"timeoutSeconds ":2}. Valid values: `command`, `initialDelaySeconds`, `periodSeconds`, `timeoutSeconds`.

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Graceful offline timeout, the default is 30, the unit is seconds. The value range is 1~60. Valid values: [1,60].
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="timezone_go">
<a href="#timezone_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Timezone</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tomcatconfig_go">
<a href="#tomcatconfig_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tomcat<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="updatestrategy_go">
<a href="#updatestrategy_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Update<wbr>Strategy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The update strategy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="versionid_go">
<a href="#versionid_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Version<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application version id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The vswitch id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"

</span>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tomcatconfig_nodejs">
<a href="#tomcatconfig_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tomcat<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="updatestrategy_nodejs">
<a href="#updatestrategy_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">update<wbr>Strategy</a>

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tomcat_config_python">
<a href="#tomcat_config_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tomcat_<wbr>config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="update_strategy_python">
<a href="#update_strategy_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">update_<wbr>strategy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The update strategy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"

## Look up an Existing Application Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing Application resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
<div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-typescript" data-lang="typescript"><span class="k">public static </span><span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">string</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#ID">Input&lt;ID&gt;</a></span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">?:</span> <span class="nx">ApplicationState</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">opts</span><span class="p">?:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResourceOptions">CustomResourceOptions</a></span><span class="p">): </span><span class="nx">Application</span></code></pre></div>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language python %}}
<div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class=nd>@staticmethod</span>
<span class="k">def </span><span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">resource_name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">str</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">str</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">opts</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/python/pulumi/#pulumi.ResourceOptions">Optional[ResourceOptions]</a></span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">app_description</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">app_name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">auto_config</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[bool]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">auto_enable_application_scaling_rule</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[bool]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">batch_wait_time</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">change_order_desc</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">command</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">command_args</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">config_map_mount_desc</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">cpu</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">custom_host_alias</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">deploy</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[bool]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">edas_container_version</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">enable_ahas</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">enable_grey_tag_route</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[bool]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">envs</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">image_url</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">jar_start_args</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">jar_start_options</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">jdk</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">liveness</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">memory</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">min_ready_instances</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">mount_desc</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">mount_host</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">namespace_id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">nas_id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">oss_ak_id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">oss_ak_secret</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">oss_mount_descs</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">package_type</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">package_url</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">package_version</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">php_arms_config_location</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">php_config</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">php_config_location</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">post_start</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">pre_stop</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">readiness</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">replicas</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">security_group_id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">sls_configs</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">termination_grace_period_seconds</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">timezone</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">tomcat_config</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">update_strategy</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">version_id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">vswitch_id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">war_start_options</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">web_container</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">) -&gt;</span> Application</code></pre></div>
{{% /choosable %}}

The following state arguments are supported:


{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_appdescription_csharp">
<a href="#state_appdescription_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">App<wbr>Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application description information. No more than 1024 characters.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_appname_csharp">
<a href="#state_appname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">App<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application Name. Combinations of numbers, letters, and dashes (-) are allowed. It must start with a letter and the maximum length is 36 characters.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_autoconfig_csharp">
<a href="#state_autoconfig_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Auto<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The auto config. Valid values: `false`, `true`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_autoenableapplicationscalingrule_csharp">
<a href="#state_autoenableapplicationscalingrule_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Auto<wbr>Enable<wbr>Application<wbr>Scaling<wbr>Rule</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The auto enable application scaling rule. Valid values: `false`, `true`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_batchwaittime_csharp">
<a href="#state_batchwaittime_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Batch<wbr>Wait<wbr>Time</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The batch wait time.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_changeorderdesc_csharp">
<a href="#state_changeorderdesc_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Change<wbr>Order<wbr>Desc</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The change order desc.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_command_csharp">
<a href="#state_command_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Command</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Mirror start command. The command must be an executable object in the container. For example: sleep. Setting this command will cause the original startup command of the mirror to become invalid.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_commandargs_csharp">
<a href="#state_commandargs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Command<wbr>Args</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Mirror startup command parameters. The parameters required for the above start command. For example: 1d.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_configmapmountdesc_csharp">
<a href="#state_configmapmountdesc_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Config<wbr>Map<wbr>Mount<wbr>Desc</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}ConfigMap mount description.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_cpu_csharp">
<a href="#state_cpu_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Cpu</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The CPU required for each instance, in millicores, cannot be 0. Valid values: `1000`, `16000`, `2000`, `32000`, `4000`, `500`, `8000`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_customhostalias_csharp">
<a href="#state_customhostalias_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Custom<wbr>Host<wbr>Alias</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Custom host mapping in the container. For example: [{`hostName`:`samplehost`,`ip`:`127.0.0.1`}].
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_deploy_csharp">
<a href="#state_deploy_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Deploy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The deploy. Valid values: `false`, `true`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_edascontainerversion_csharp">
<a href="#state_edascontainerversion_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Edas<wbr>Container<wbr>Version</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The operating environment used by the Pandora application.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_enableahas_csharp">
<a href="#state_enableahas_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Enable<wbr>Ahas</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The enable ahas.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_enablegreytagroute_csharp">
<a href="#state_enablegreytagroute_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Enable<wbr>Grey<wbr>Tag<wbr>Route</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The enable grey tag route.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_envs_csharp">
<a href="#state_envs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Envs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The virtual switch where the elastic network card of the application instance is located. The switch must be located in the aforementioned VPC. The switch also has a binding relationship with the SAE namespace. If it is left blank, the default is the vSwitch ID bound to the namespace.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_imageurl_csharp">
<a href="#state_imageurl_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Image<wbr>Url</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Mirror address. Only Image type applications can configure the mirror address.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_jarstartargs_csharp">
<a href="#state_jarstartargs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Jar<wbr>Start<wbr>Args</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The JAR package starts application parameters. Application default startup command: $JAVA_HOME/bin/java $JarStartOptions -jar $CATALINA_OPTS "$package_path" $JarStartArgs.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_jarstartoptions_csharp">
<a href="#state_jarstartoptions_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Jar<wbr>Start<wbr>Options</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The JAR package starts the application option. Application default startup command: $JAVA_HOME/bin/java $JarStartOptions -jar $CATALINA_OPTS "$package_path" $JarStartArgs.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_jdk_csharp">
<a href="#state_jdk_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Jdk</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The JDK version that the deployment package depends on. Image type applications are not supported.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_liveness_csharp">
<a href="#state_liveness_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Liveness</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Container health check. Containers that fail the health check will be shut down and restored. Currently, only the method of issuing commands in the container is supported.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_memory_csharp">
<a href="#state_memory_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Memory</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The memory required for each instance, in MB, cannot be 0. One-to-one correspondence with CPU. Valid values: `1024`, `131072`, `16384`, `2048`, `32768`, `4096`, `65536`, `8192`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_minreadyinstances_csharp">
<a href="#state_minreadyinstances_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Min<wbr>Ready<wbr>Instances</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The Minimum Available Instance. On the Change Had Promised during the Available Number of Instances to Be.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_mountdesc_csharp">
<a href="#state_mountdesc_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Mount<wbr>Desc</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Mount description.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_mounthost_csharp">
<a href="#state_mounthost_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Mount<wbr>Host</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Mount point of NAS in application VPC.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_namespaceid_csharp">
<a href="#state_namespaceid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Namespace<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}SAE namespace ID. Only namespaces whose names are lowercase letters and dashes (-) are supported, and must start with a letter. The namespace can be obtained by calling the DescribeNamespaceList interface.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_nasid_csharp">
<a href="#state_nasid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Nas<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}ID of the mounted NAS, Must be in the same region as the cluster. It must have an available mount point creation quota, or its mount point must be on a switch in the VPC. If it is not filled in and the mountDescs field is present, a NAS will be automatically purchased and mounted on the switch in the VPC by default.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_ossakid_csharp">
<a href="#state_ossakid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Oss<wbr>Ak<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}OSS AccessKey ID.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_ossaksecret_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application startup status checks, containers that fail multiple health checks will be shut down and restarted. Valid values: `command`, `initialDelaySeconds`, `periodSeconds`, `timeoutSeconds`.

</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tomcatconfig_csharp">
<a href="#state_tomcatconfig_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tomcat<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_updatestrategy_csharp">

    <dd>{{% md %}}OSS mount description information.

        <span id="state_readiness_go">
<a href="#state_readiness_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Readiness</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application startup status checks, containers that fail multiple health checks will be shut down and restarted. Containers that do not pass the health check will not receive SLB traffic. For example: {`exec`:{`command`:[`sh`,"-c","cat /home/admin/start.sh"]},`initialDelaySeconds`:30,`periodSeconds`:30,"timeoutSeconds ":2}. Valid values: `command`, `initialDelaySeconds`, `periodSeconds`, `timeoutSeconds`.

</span>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_timezone_go">
<a href="#state_timezone_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Timezone</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tomcatconfig_go">
<a href="#state_tomcatconfig_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tomcat<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_updatestrategy_go">
<a href="#state_updatestrategy_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Update<wbr>Strategy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The update strategy.

    <dd>{{% md %}}The vswitch id.

    </dt>

Valid values: `command`, `initialDelaySeconds`, `periodSeconds`, `timeoutSeconds`.

    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tomcatconfig_nodejs">
<a href="#state_tomcatconfig_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tomcat<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_updatestrategy_nodejs">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Deployment package address. Only FatJar or War type applications can configure the deployment package address.

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The version number of the deployment package. Required when the Package Type is War and FatJar.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_php_arms_config_location_python">

    <dd>{{% md %}}The PHP application monitors the mount path, and you need to ensure that the PHP server will load the configuration file of this path. You don't need to pay attention to the configuration content, SAE will automatically render the correct configuration file.

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Execute the script before stopping, the format is like: {`exec`:{`command`:[`cat`,"/etc/group"]}}.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_readiness_python">
<a href="#state_readiness_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">readiness</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application startup status checks, containers that fail multiple health checks will be shut down and restarted. Containers that do not pass the health check will not receive SLB traffic. For example: {`exec`:{`command`:[`sh`,"-c","cat /home/admin/start.sh"]},`initialDelaySeconds`:30,`periodSeconds`:30,"timeoutSeconds ":2}. Valid values: `command`, `initialDelaySeconds`, `periodSeconds`, `timeoutSeconds`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_termination_grace_period_seconds_python">
<a href="#state_termination_grace_period_seconds_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">termination_<wbr>grace_<wbr>period_<wbr>seconds</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Graceful offline timeout, the default is 30, the unit is seconds. The value range is 1~60. Valid values: [1,60].
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_timezone_python">
<a href="#state_timezone_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">timezone</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Time zone, the default value is Asia/Shanghai.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_tomcat_config_python">
<a href="#state_tomcat_config_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tomcat_<wbr>config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Tomcat file configuration, set to "{}" means to delete the configuration:  useDefaultConfig: Whether to use a custom configuration, if it is true, it means that the custom configuration is not used; if it is false, it means that the custom configuration is used. If you do not use custom configuration, the following parameter configuration will not take effect.  contextInputType: Select the access path of the application.  war: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is the WAR package name. root: No need to fill in the custom path, the access path of the application is /. custom: You need to fill in the custom path in the custom path below. contextPath: custom path, this parameter only needs to be configured when the contextInputType type is custom.  httpPort: The port range is 1024~65535. Ports less than 1024 need Root permission to operate. Because the container is configured with Admin permissions, please fill in a port greater than 1024. If not configured, the default is 8080. maxThreads: Configure the number of connections in the connection pool, the default size is 400. uriEncoding: Tomcat encoding format, including UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, GBK and GB2312. If not set, the default is ISO-8859-1. useBodyEncoding: Whether to use BodyEncoding for URL. Valid values: `contextInputType`, `contextPath`, `httpPort`, `maxThreads`, `uriEncoding`, `useBodyEncoding`, `useDefaultConfig`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_update_strategy_python">
<a href="#state_update_strategy_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">update_<wbr>strategy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The update strategy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

<a href="#state_version_id_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">version_<wbr>id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Application version id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

<a href="#state_vswitch_id_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">vswitch_<wbr>id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The vswitch id.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_war_start_options_python">

</span>

{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}





## Import


Serverless App Engine (SAE) Application can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import alicloud:sae/application:Application example <id>
```
